title: High-quality chromosome-level genome assembly of female Artemia franciscana reveals sex chromosome and Hox gene organization
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Euna Jo, Minjoo Cho, Soyun Choi, Seung Jae Lee, Eunkyung Choi, Jinmu Kim, Jang Yeon Kim, Sooyeon Kwon, Jun Hyuck Lee, Hyun Park
